(:action gather ; Gather resources from a location and add them to inventory
:parameters (?p - person ?loc - location ?item - object)
:precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?item ?loc))
:effect (inventory ?p ?item))

(:action push ; Push an object to a designated position
  :parameters (?actor - entity ?obj - object ?target - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?target) (inventory ?actor ?obj) (shape ?target circular))
  :effect (squares_position ?obj away_from_ends))

(:action slide ; Slide a movable object within a defined space
:parameters (?agent - entity ?object - movable ?space - area ?pos - position)
:precondition (and (at ?agent ?pos) (at ?object ?pos) (object_position ?object initial_state))
:effect (object_position ?object final_state))

(:action finish ; Finalize a task by updating the status of an entity
    :parameters (?p - person ?entity - object ?status_from - status ?status_to - status ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (status ?entity ?status_from))
    :effect (and (status ?entity ?status_to) (not (status ?entity ?status_from))

(:action untwist ; Untwist an object and change its shape or configuration
  :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - tool ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?entity ?loc) (at ?tool ?loc) (shape ?entity straight))
  :effect (and (shape ?entity untwisted) (not (shape ?entity straight))
